name: Close to the Metal
description:
Work as an engineer repairing electrical circuits by adding and replacing components. Don't disappoint your AI supervisor or you'll find yourself out of a job.

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 Global Game Jam.  

Ideally (if I had more time) I would've added more levels and made the levels have actual puzzles. As it stands, it's really the framework for a game.
